abstract: Shoppers armed with tablets can use an app to get a sense of how different clothes might mix and match.
snippet: Shoppers armed with tablets can use an app to get a sense of how different clothes might mix and match.
lead_paragraph: Many retailers, as varied as Saks Fifth Avenue and Wal-Mart, are putting out new iPad apps in time for the holiday season, reports Claire Cain Miller of The New York Times. She says these apps do away with scrolling through pages of items online and make shopping more entertaining. About 60 percent of tablet owners use them to shop and many, especially young people, say they prefer shopping on tablets to smartphones and even computers.

headline.main: Retailers Enliven Catalog Offerings Through Apps
